 ,(https://interfaithrise.org)
About Refugee School Impact Ι 732-357-0590 Ι info@interfaithrise.org,
info@interfaithrise.org ,(mailto:info@interfaithrise.org)
I-RISE works with school-aged clients and their families to ensure students are enrolled in school in a timely fashion;  they have access to academic support outside of the classroom (after school tutoring) as needed;  encourages parents to be engaged in their children’s education (parent orientation); and educates school personnel to be culturally sensitive to clients’ needs. As a result, RSI provides services that improve refugee students’ academic performance, improve their English language acquisition, engage parent participation in school activities, and ensure that school staff is aware of their culture and beliefs (advocating for prayer time, for example). ,
Services Include:,
Eligibility:  You MUST be an established I-RISE client before you can utilize Refugee School Impact.  Please call 732-357-0590 or email info@interfaithrise.org  ,
info@interfaithrise.org ,(mailto:info@interfaithrise.org)
Resources,
The School Impact Team will assist you in the registration process. Please be available to answer some questions regarding your child’s social, developmental, language and health status. Schools’ requirements may vary by district. The team will inform you of any additional forms or information needed.,
Physicals are scheduled by our medical coordinator.,
 ,
Volunteer,
,
The Refugee School Impact Team works with all families who have school aged children, assisting with everything from registration, to advocacy, tutoring and more.,
We have been busy enrolling dozens of students in schools throughout New Jersey.,
The School Impact team is always looking for volunteer tutors in Math, Science, and ESL for school aged children. Requires 1 to 2 day commitment during the hours 4-6pm. Perfect for high school students or adults (background check required). Fluency in Ukrainian, Pashto, Dari, Haitian Creole, or Spanish helpful but not required. Please contact Princess@interfaithrise.org  to get involved!,
Princess@interfaithrise.org ,(mailto:Princess@interfaithrise.org)
 ,
Interfaith-RISE is a program of the Reformed Church of Highland Park Affordable Housing corporation, a non-profit, 501(c)3 organization that provides affordable housing, supportive services, and connection to meaningful community to low-income individuals and families in central New Jersey. All RCHP-AHC projects are non-discriminatory and are open to the public. Learn more at rchp-ahc.org,
 rchp-ahc.org ,(http://rchp-ahc.org/)
info@interfaithrise.org ,(mailto:info@interfaithrise.org)
